    • Method Detail

      • debugSetup

        public static void debugSetup(java.lang.String user,
                              BankProject.Screen state)
        Debug method used to load in a specific user and state
        Parameters:
        user - Username of user to be loaded in
        state - Screen state to set program to

      • populateMap

        private static void populateMap(User.UserType userType)
        Method to establish all menu options for necessary screens
        Parameters:
        userType - Type of user to load menu options based off of

      • loadUser

        private static User loadUser(java.lang.String name)
        Method to load a user from their user.json file, given username as input. Parses the returned JSONObject to set the fields of the user to load, and loads in all funds from the user's transaction log if they exist
        Parameters:
        name - Username of user to load in
        Returns:
        User that was loaded in

      • getUIDs

        private static java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> getUIDs()
        Method to get all active UIDs
        Returns:
        ArrayList of all current uids

      • moneyCheck

        private static double moneyCheck(java.lang.String deposit)
        Checks to make sure that money amounts are valid before doing operations with them.
        Parameters:
        deposit - Money string being validated
        Returns:
        Validated money string as a double

      • createUser

        private static void createUser(User cu)
        Creates a new user by making a new user directory, messages directory, user json file, and transaction log. Reads in to make sure that the user being added is valid, then generates a validated UID and writes it out to UID file. A user JSONObject is created, all necessary tags are set based on passed-in user files is updated with new directory.
        Parameters:
        cu - User to create

      • removeUser

        private static void removeUser(User cu)
        Removes the user directory associated with current user, as well as associated UID. Updates files after finishing, to reflect removed user
        Parameters:
        cu - User to remove

      • removeUser

        private static void removeUser(java.io.File f)
        Reads in user directory, and removes user UID and recursively deletes all files in the directory. Updates files after finishing, to reflect removed user
        Parameters:
        f - User directory to remove

      • removeUID

        private static void removeUID(java.lang.String uid)
        Method to remove UID from uids file. Reads in UIDs from getUIDs(), and deletes specified
        Parameters:
        uid - User ID to remove

      • removeDirectory

        private static void removeDirectory(java.io.File dir)
        Method to recursively remove all files in a directory
        Parameters:
        dir - Directory to remove

      • menuPrint

        private static void menuPrint(BankProject.Screen menu)
        Method to print out the menu options for a given screen using menuLookup. No validation is done to ensure that current screen state has available options
        Parameters:
        menu - Desired screen state

      • checkInput

        private static java.lang.String[] checkInput(BankProject.Screen state,
                                             java.lang.String input)
        Method to validate user input against the option set provided from menuLookup
        Parameters:
        state - Screen state used as argument for menuLookup
        input - User input string
        Returns:
        The validated user input

      • checkInput

        private static java.lang.String[] checkInput(java.lang.String input)
        Overloaded checkInput(Screen, String) to validate screen input assuming that options are from current screen
        Parameters:
        input - User input for option choice
        Returns:
        The validated user input

        Parameters:
